name: Direct Connect
desc: Allows for directly connecting resources to the queue.  This is for resources that are physically owned and controlled and need to always be connected.

name: Amazon Web Services
desc: Automatically creates AWS EC2 instances, connecting them to the queue to take your cracking into the cloud.  Tracks instance use and will terminate them if unused to control costs.  A default community AMI is available or a custom one can be used.
